project.name: CSS Software Timeline
project.description: React-based dashboard for tracking software projects within the CSS team. Features Gantt charts, project cards, filtering, and multi-view dashboard.
project.priorityReason: Internal tool needed to track all CSS team projects and improve visibility

tasks.name: Phase 1: Foundation & MVP
tasks.description:
Initial project setup and core functionality:
- React 19 + Vite 7 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS v4 setup
- Core components: GanttChart, FilterBar, ProjectList, ProjectCard
- Dashboard architecture: DashboardView, SummaryStats, ViewToggle
- Project view with tabs: Details, Gantt, Tasks, Activity
- frappe-gantt integration and CSS conflict resolution

tasks.name: MVP Complete
tasks.description: Functional dashboard with Gantt charts, filtering, and project views

tasks.name: Phase 2: Data Architecture
tasks.description:
YAML-based project data management:
- YAML schema design with comprehensive documentation
- Import modal with drag & drop file upload
- Parser integration with validation & error handling
- TypeScript types for Project, Task, Stakeholder entities

tasks.name: YAML Data Source Complete
tasks.description: Full YAML import workflow with validation

tasks.name: Phase 2.5: UX Enhancements
tasks.description:
User experience improvements:
- Enhanced Gantt popup with rich metadata display
- LocalStorage persistence for imported projects
- Update existing projects confirmation dialog
- CLAUDE.md documentation and workflow instructions

tasks.name: Enhanced Import Complete
tasks.description: Full import workflow with persistence, updates, and documentation

tasks.name: Phase 3: Gantt Improvements
tasks.description:
Gantt chart UX overhaul:
- Replace floating popup with right-side TaskDetailsPanel
- Slide-in panel animation (300ms transition)
- 70:30 layout ratio for panel content
- Subtasks parsing with status-aware icons
- ProjectSummaryFooter with metrics and upcoming milestones
- Remove redundant project name prefix from task labels
- InlineLegend component in header

tasks.name: Gantt UX Complete
tasks.description: Professional-grade Gantt interface with side panel and summary footer

tasks.name: Phase 4: Version Control & Polish
tasks.description:
Production readiness:
- Git repository initialization and commit history
- Inline editing of project metadata
- Inline editing of task data (status, progress, hours)
- Export improvements (better PDF formatting)
- CSV export functionality

tasks.name: v1.0 Release
tasks.description: First stable release with full CRUD and export functionality

tasks.name: Phase 5: Future Enhancements
tasks.description:
Nice-to-have features:
- File watcher for auto-detecting timeline.yaml changes
- Dark mode support with theme toggle
- Keyboard shortcuts for common actions

backlog.name: Visual Timeline Context Panel
backlog.description:
Show mini project timeline in the task details panel, highlighting
where the selected task fits in the overall project context.

backlog.name: Drag & Drop Task Rescheduling
backlog.description: Allow users to drag task bars on the Gantt chart to reschedule

backlog.name: Multiple Assignees per Task
backlog.description: Support assigning multiple people to a single task

backlog.name: Due Date Notifications
backlog.description: Browser notifications for upcoming deadlines and overdue tasks

backlog.name: GitHub Issues Integration
backlog.description: Sync tasks with GitHub issues for two-way updates

backlog.name: Quick Stats Cards
backlog.description:
Add summary stat cards at top of DetailsTab showing:
- Total tasks count
- Completed tasks (with percentage)
- In Progress tasks (with percentage)
- Blocked/Pending tasks (with percentage)
Visual cards with icons, similar to Monday.com and ClickUp dashboards.

backlog.name: Project Health Indicator
backlog.description:
Auto-calculated health status displayed as badge:
- ðŸŸ¢ On Track: schedule variance < 10%, budget variance < 10%
- ðŸŸ¡ At Risk: schedule or budget variance 10-25%
- ðŸ”´ Off Track: schedule or budget variance > 25%
Calculate based on: (actual progress vs expected progress) and (actual hours vs estimated hours).

backlog.name: Mini Timeline with 'You Are Here'
backlog.description:
Compact horizontal timeline bar showing:
- Project start to end range
- Current date marker ("You are here") with floating date label
- Milestone markers (purple diamonds)
- Day X of Y indicator (e.g., "Day 34 of 57")
Similar to Linear's project progress visualization.

backlog.name: Velocity & Burn Rate Metrics
backlog.description:
Calculate and display project velocity:
- Hours burned per week (average)
- Tasks completed per week
- Projected completion date based on current velocity
- Budget forecast (on budget / over budget / under budget)

backlog.name: Completion Forecast
backlog.description:
Predictive completion date based on velocity:
- "At current pace, project will finish: [date]"
- Risk indicator if forecast exceeds deadline
- Days ahead/behind schedule indicator
- Velocity (hours/day), remaining hours, progress metrics
- Confidence indicator (high/medium/low)

backlog.name: Inline Recent Activity Feed
backlog.description:
Show last 3-5 activities directly on DetailsTab (not separate tab):
- Task completions with dates
- Milestone achievements
- Status changes
Compact format, expandable to full Activity tab.

backlog.name: Upcoming Milestones Preview
backlog.description:
Show next 2-3 upcoming milestones on DetailsTab:
- Milestone name and target date
- Days until milestone (with countdown: "Tomorrow", "3 days", "~2 weeks")
- Dependency status (ready / blocked) with "Waiting on: [tasks]" indicator
- Color-coded urgency (red overdue, amber â‰¤7 days, gray normal)

project.name: CSS Toolkit
project.description:
Chrome extension productivity tools for Kledo CRM - PT Cepat Service Station.
Features: Referensi Generator (reference codes), Alamat Pengiriman (shipping addresses),
Google Sheets sync, and Deletion Audit System (document recovery).
project.priorityReason: Active daily use by CSS team, increases productivity, critical for operations, new deletion recovery capability requested by users

tasks.name: Phase 1: Core Extension (v1.0-v2.0)
tasks.description:
Initial extension development:
- Referensi Generator with auto-increment codes
- Alamat Pengiriman (shipping address manager)
- Floating button UI on Kledo pages
- Content script architecture (Manifest V3)
- Panel system with drag & drop

tasks.name: v2.0 Released
tasks.description: Major redesign shipped - floating panels, content scripts

tasks.name: Phase 2: Google Sheets Sync (v2.1-v2.3)
tasks.description:
Cloud sync and data management:
- Google Sheets integration with Apps Script backend
- OAuth 2.0 authentication
- Automatic background sync
- Export/Import backup feature
- Auto-update via GitHub Pages
- Rebranding to CSS Toolkit

tasks.name: v2.3.4 Released
tasks.description: Google Sync + CSS Toolkit rebrand shipped to production

tasks.name: Phase 3: Deletion Audit System (v3.0)
tasks.description:
Document recovery and audit system:
- Intercept document deletions in Kledo
- Audit logging to Google Sheets
- Recovery Panel UI with table/detail views
- Invoice Suggestion Widgets (SI, PI, DO, PD)
- Form auto-fill helpers
- Resizable panels
- Keyboard shortcuts (Alt-based)
- Contact hyperlinks
Branch: feature/deletion-audit-system-v2.3.0 (202 commits, +20K LOC)

tasks.name: Phase 4: Polish & Release
tasks.description:
Final preparation for v3.0 release:
- Testing and bug fixes
- Documentation updates
- Merge feature branch to main
- Production deployment

tasks.name: v3.0 Released
tasks.description: Deletion Audit System shipped to production

backlog.name: Export/Import Project & Address Lists
backlog.description: Allow users to export and import their project/address libraries as files

backlog.name: Bulk Reference Generation
backlog.description: Generate multiple references at once for batch operations

backlog.name: Deeper Kledo CRM Integration
backlog.description: Direct API integration with Kledo for enhanced automation

backlog.name: Project Templates
backlog.description: Pre-defined templates for common project types

backlog.name: Custom Reference Format Options
backlog.description: Allow users to customize reference code format

backlog.name: Team Synchronization
backlog.description: Cloud-based sync for team sharing of references and addresses

backlog.name: Analytics Dashboard
backlog.description: Usage patterns, most-used projects, productivity metrics
